Node.definition: = action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans and deities have character, integrity, and good fortune
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) brother of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► first high priest (כֹּהֵן)
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which humans experience fear
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= a state in which humans experience extreme anxiety, ◄ as a result of difficult circumstances, as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= short form of יהוה (יהוה) only found in poetic texts
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= short form of יהוה (יהוה) only found in poetic texts
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= person who experiences hostily towards someone else and acts accordingly
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= action by which humans who find themselves in difficult circumstances put their trust in someone else, ► in order to find protection or safety
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans have confidence in someone or something else and show that by their actions; ≈ usually regarded as negative when the object is human, always positive when the object is YHWH
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= action by which humans who find themselves in difficult circumstances put their trust in someone else, ► in order to find protection or safety
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans have confidence in someone or something else and show that by their actions; ≈ usually regarded as negative when the object is human, always positive when the object is YHWH
= member of the nobility; ≈ associated with authority; expected to be generous, reliable, and just

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
literally: to go around; hence: = action by which groups of humans or animals take position all around an individual, a group, or an object
literally: name; hence: = state in which someone acts with the authority of someone else
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
exact meaning unknown; probably: = to kill an uncircumcised enemy, and remove his foreskin as proof
literally: to go around; hence: = action by which groups of humans or animals take position all around an individual, a group, or an object
marker expressing a speaker's confirmation of the truth of a statement; in some cases the truth of this statement is conceded
literally: to go around; hence: = action by which groups of humans or animals take position all around an individual, a group, or an object
literally: name; hence: = state in which someone acts with the authority of someone else
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
exact meaning unknown; probably: = to kill an uncircumcised enemy, and remove his foreskin as proof
literally: to go around; hence: = action by which groups of humans or animals take position all around an individual, a group, or an object

= flying insect that collects nectar from flowers and converts it into honey; lives in swarms made up of many thousands of insects; sting only when threatened; ≈ with connotations ranging from positive (food producing) to negative (as metaphor for an army of well organized enemies
= process by which a fire or light is put out; ≈ associated with the beginning of difficult times, and sometimes even death

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= small shrub with thorns; ≈ associated with things of no value, aggression, and destruction
literally: name; hence: = state in which someone acts with the authority of someone else
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
exact meaning unknown; probably: = to kill an uncircumcised enemy, and remove his foreskin as proof
= causative action by which someone give another person or object a violent push in a certain direction ► in order to cause that person or object to move away or to fall
= causative action by which someone give another person or object a violent push in a certain direction ► in order to cause that person or object to move away or to fall
= process by which humans or animals lose their balance while walking or standing and end up flat on the ground; ≈ associated with failure and loss of face
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
poetic term: = words set to music|= a deity that is the source of someone's strength
= short form of יהוה (יהוה) only found in poetic texts
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success
= construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: to do substantially; hence: = action as a result of which humans or deities are deemed worthy of respect, because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to make high; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities grant an elevated status to humans in the eyes of other people
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: to do substantially; hence: = action as a result of which humans or deities are deemed worthy of respect, because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

Node.gloss: to tell|to recount|to proclaim: to declare
Node.definition: = action by which humans communicate verbally to others about an event or situation, with focus on the contents rather than on the speech act
= short form of יהוה (יהוה) only found in poetic texts

= action by which humans or deities respond to negative behavior of (other) humans by administering some sort of punishment, which may range from a verbal rebuke to physical correction, ► often done with corrective intent, but sometimes also as retribution

= action by which humans or deities respond to negative behavior of (other) humans by administering some sort of punishment, which may range from a verbal rebuke to physical correction, ► often done with corrective intent, but sometimes also as retribution
= short form of יהוה (יהוה) only found in poetic texts
= process by which humans or animals stop living

= causative action by which humans or deities allow others entrance, passage, or access (in)to a building, construction, or area ◄ by withdrawing a gate, door, window, lid, covering, or other boundary; ≈ sometimes associated with freedom, sometimes with being exposed, vulnerable

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= short form of יהוה (יהוה) only found in poetic texts
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success
= block of stone, whether fully square or not;◄ found in nature or hewn from a quarry; ► used for building houses, walls, and other constructions
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

Node.gloss: to cause to happen|to bring about
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause events to take place without them having to necessarily be involved in the event itself
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
mainly in poetical texts: = state in which humans feel and show great joy
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy
= marker introducing a very humble request
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= marker introducing a very humble request
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to make successful|to give success|to make prosper
Node.definition: = causative action by which a deity assists or helps a human complete a task with the desired outcome

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
literally: name; hence: = state in which someone acts with the authority of someone else
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to cause to shine|to give light to|to light up|radiant|resplendent
Node.definition: = action that causes something to emit or to reflect light; ≈ associated with well being and wisdom
= causative action by which humans tie (part of) the body of (other) humans or animals with a rope, cord, or chain ► in order to keep them under control
= animal that is sacrificed during a festival
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= projection in the form of the horn of an animal; ◄ located at each of the four corners of the altar
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which humans acknowledge the elevated status of deities and give expression to that
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans and deities have character, integrity, and good fortune
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
